snippet: The Metropolitan Museum exhibition “Warriors and Mothers: Epic Mbembe Art” displays African sculptures that go against the tide of most work from that continent.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews exhibit Warriors and Mothers: Epic Mbembe Art, featuring African sculptures from 17th and 18th centuries, at Metropolitan Museum of Art.
lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Museum exhibition “Warriors and Mothers: Epic Mbembe Art” displays African sculptures that go against the tide of most work from that continent.

headline.seo: ‘Warriors and Mothers: Epic Mbembe Art’ at the Metropolitan Museum
